artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical with music sheet (P.15,519-P.15,520); bed with elaborate frame upholstered with fabric in blue, red and white and draped with a canopy of blue and red fabric with white plumes at the top; a chair is situated on either side of the bed which sits in the center of the page
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Dix-huitième Cahier, 15 Août 1790
